overview:
At the age of four she spoke three languages fluently, at the age of five she discovered the truth about Santa Claus and at the age of 19 moved to Maidstone/England, studying Art & Design, then Global Design in Paris/France and finally graduated as Industrial Designer in 1998 Milan/Italy. Since 2000 she has been working as front-end-developer, designing and building websites, creating user interfaces and improving workflows.

Today she is thrilled about generating new ideas, analyzing usability and simplifying web-based applications. Can’t stand being bored, loves the unconventional, Mount Sims and Snowboarding.

Her favorite quote: â€œLogic will get you from A to B, imagination will take you anywhere.â€ - A. Einstein
